terrorism_reporting.description: If you are reporting a crime that is happening right now or if there is a threat to someone's life, call 999 immediately.

rtm-confirm-delete.confirm-deletion: Please confirm you wish to remove the following web address from your report
rtm-confirm-delete.delete-confirmed: The selected web address was successfully removed from your report.

rtm-confirm-edit.confirm-edit: Please update the details of your report
rtm-confirm-edit.edit-confirmed: The selected web address report was successfully edited.

rtm-confirmation.check-details: Check the details of web address

rtm-completion.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
rtm-completion.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to
